title: Store vcpkg dependencies (DEPEN_PKGS) in source repo instead of release-tools

content.raw:
For the windows jobs using colcon, we currently store the list of dependencies to install with vcpkg inside the release-tools build script for that package. I think that is brittle; it would be nicer to store it in a metadata file in the source repository.


#!/osrf/release-tools/src/e9cd7ec59e4e366fe37869bc8e4f9cc3f553fc12/jenkins-scripts/ign_gui-default-devel-windows-amd64.bat#lines-8
